decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly disrupting the opponent's game plan while also applying pressure through aggressive creatures. The key strategy involves using cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to control the opponent's hand and board, while also utilizing bounce effects like Flickerwisp and Ephemerate to continuously disrupt their plays. By combining aggressive creatures like Overlord of the Balemurk and Solitude with disruptive elements like Recruiter of the Guard and Witch Enchanter, this deck aims to establish a proactive game plan that can quickly overwhelm the opponent.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures and then reanimate them for a powerful combo finish. By using cards like Persist and Unearth, along with discard spells like Thoughtseize and Faithless Looting, you can set up your graveyard with creatures like Emperor of Bones and Archon of Cruelty. Once you have the necessary components in the graveyard, you can use spells like Raucous Theater and Psychic Frog to reanimate them and overwhelm your opponent with a strong board presence. The deck aims to win the game through a quick and efficient reanimation strategy.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize artifacts to quickly flood the board with cheap and efficient creatures while also generating card advantage through cards like Thoughtcast and Thought Monitor. The deck aims to be aggressive and fast-paced, leveraging cards like Cranial Plating to enhance the damage output of the creatures. With a focus on using artifacts to power up, this deck seeks to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of speed and power, aiming to win the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

This deck focuses on aggressive play by combining cards that disrupt opponents' strategies with creatures that can quickly deal damage. Using cards like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp to control the board, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with creatures like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Overlord of the Balemurk. Quantum Riddler and Witch Enchanter provide additional disruption, while cards like Fatal Push and Solitude help to eliminate threats. The deck aims to disrupt opponents while quickly building a formidable board presence to secure victory.

The deck focuses on using aggressive creatures like Emperor of Bones and Overlord of the Balemurk to apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their strategy with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push. It also includes cards like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp to blink creatures for additional value. The deck is designed to control the game by taxing the opponent's resources and maintaining board presence with powerful creatures. It also has some graveyard hate with cards like Relic of Progenitus to disrupt graveyard strategies.

The deck focuses on aggressively disrupting the opponent's game plan while establishing a strong board presence. It utilizes efficient removal spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize to control the opponent's board while deploying powerful creatures like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to pressure the opponent. Additionally, the deck includes disruptive creatures like Flickerwisp and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer to further disrupt the opponent's strategy. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's aggressive game plan while providing the necessary colors for its powerful spells and creatures.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt and control your opponent's resources while quickly attacking with aggressive creatures. The deck utilizes cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push to disrupt your opponent's game plan, while creatures like Flickerwisp and Overlord of the Balemurk provide aggressive threats. Cards like Ephemerate and Solitude provide additional value and protection for your creatures. By taxing your opponent's resources and applying pressure with a mix of disruptive and aggressive creatures, this deck aims to control the game and come out on top.

The main concept of the deck is to control the game through powerful Eldrazi creatures and colorless spells while utilizing the UrzaTron lands to quickly ramp up mana production. The deck includes several cards to disrupt the opponent's strategy, such as Thought-Knot Seer and Karn, the Great Creator, alongside removal spells like Dismember and Kozilek's Command. Overall, the deck aims to consistently power out large threats like Devourer of Destiny and Sire of Seven Deaths to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The deck focuses on quickly reanimating powerful creatures from the graveyard using cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Ephemerate. A key combo involves using Atraxa, Grand Unifier to reduce the cost of the reanimation spells, along with cards like Faithful Mending to dig for combo pieces. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Negation and Prismatic Ending to control the board. The end goal is to create a powerful board presence and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of instant-speed reanimation and disruptive spells.

The deck focuses on assembling the combo of Colossus Hammer and Puresteel Paladin to create a powerful threat. Stoneforge Mystic and Urza's Saga help to tutor for key pieces, while Inkmoth Nexus and Shadowspear provide alternative win conditions. The deck aims to quickly equip Colossus Hammer to a creature and attack for lethal damage. Leyline Axe and Nettlecyst provide additional equipment options, while Tezzeret, Cruel Captain offers card advantage and disruption. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and efficient combo strategy.

This deck focuses on generating mana quickly and efficiently to cast a flurry of spells, allowing the player to chain together multiple spells and generate extreme amounts of value. The key strategy is to ramp up mana production with rituals and medallions, while cycling through the deck with cards like Reckless Impulse and Glimpse the Impossible. Using cards like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Past in Flames, the deck aims to assemble a powerful combo using cards like Valakut Awakening and Artist's Talent to overwhelm the opponent in a single explosive turn.

The main focus of this Ruby Storm deck is to generate mana quickly and efficiently through cards like Pyretic Ritual and Desperate Ritual, while also digging for combo pieces with cards such as Reckless Impulse and Wrenn's Resolve. The deck aims to cast powerful spells like Past in Flames and Ral, Monsoon Mage to generate a massive storm count, eventually finishing the opponent off with a lethal Grapeshot or Raucous Theater. The deck also utilizes Wish to access sideboard cards when needed, while maintaining consistency with cards like Ruby Medallion.

The deck revolves around using Allosaurus Rider to quickly search out and play powerful creatures such as Griselbrand, Ghalta, and Atraxa. By utilizing cards like Eldritch Evolution and Neoform, the deck is able to consistently assemble its combo pieces and win the game through overwhelming creature presence and combo potential. Consign to Memory and Pact of Negation provide additional control and protection, while cards like Xenagos, God of Revels and Planar Genesis can help push for a game-winning swing. The key strategy is to efficiently set up your combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures.

The deck revolves around quickly generating mana using ritual spells and Ruby Medallion to cast powerful spells like Glimpse the Impossible and Ral, Monsoon Mage. Reckless Impulse and Valakut Awakening can help draw more cards while Past in Flames allows you to recast instants and sorceries from your graveyard. The goal is to storm off and cast as many spells as possible in a single turn, overwhelming your opponent with a flurry of powerful sorceries and instants to win the game.

The deck focuses on disrupting and controlling the opponent's game plan through a combination of counterspells, hand disruption, and removal spells. It also includes cards that provide card advantage and card selection to help maintain control over the game. The win condition includes powerful creatures like Murktide Regent and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares, as well as the ability to outvalue the opponent with cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. The mana base is designed to provide consistent access to all necessary colors of mana for spells and abilities.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu to apply pressure on the opponent. Utilizing cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Leyline of the Guildpact, it aims to enhance the power of its creatures and overwhelm the opponent. Lightning Bolt provides additional removal and reach, while Leyline Binding and Stubborn Denial help protect key threats. The mana base is optimized for consistent early plays and powerful late game options like Scion of Draco. Overall, the deck aims to establish a fast clock and maintain board control to secure victory.
